def learn_charitable_game(arr):
  return sum(arr) % len(arr) == 0 and sum(arr) > 0

from statistics import mean

def learn_charitable_game(arr):
    m = mean(arr)
    return int(m)==m and m>0

def learn_charitable_game(arr):
    if min(arr) <= 0 and max(arr) <= 0:
        return False
    tot = sum(arr)
    mean = round(tot/len(arr))
    result = sum((mean-x) for x in arr)
    return result == 0

def learn_charitable_game(arr):
    return set(arr) != {0} and not sum(arr) % len(arr)

def learn_charitable_game(arr):
     return  sum(arr)/len(arr) ==  sum(arr)//len(arr) if sum(arr) > 0 else False
